game.name: PAYDAY 2: Southbound Tailor Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 페이데이 일당이 새 의상을 갖춰 입고 싸울 준비를 마친 채 텍사스를 향해 남쪽으로 떠납니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The crew heads southbound for Texas, donned in new outfits and ready for action.
